gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH self_interested_heroes AS ( SELECT sh.superhero_name, a.alignment FROM superhero sh JOIN alignment a ON sh.alignment_id = a.id WHERE a.alignment IN ('Neutral', 'Self-Serving') ) SELECT ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM superhero), 2) AS overall_percentage, COUNT(*) AS marvel_count FROM self_interested_heroes sih JOIN superhero sh ON sih.superhero_name = sh.superhero_name JOIN publisher p ON sh.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics';
chatgpt_4mini: WITH total_superheroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS total FROM superhero s ), self_interested_heroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS count FROM superhero s JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id WHERE a.alignment IN ('Good', 'Neutral', 'Evil') ), marvel_self_interested_heroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS count FROM superhero s JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE a.alignment IN ('Good', 'Neutral', 'Evil') AND p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' ) SELECT (sih.count * 100.0 / ts.total) AS percentage_of_self_interested, msh.count AS marvel_count FROM total_superheroes ts, self_interested_heroes sih, marvel_self_interested_heroes msh;

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH publisher_hero_counts AS ( SELECT p.publisher_name, COUNT(*) AS hero_count FROM superhero sh JOIN publisher p ON sh.publisher_id = p.id GROUP BY p.publisher_name ) SELECT CASE WHEN phc1.hero_count > phc2.hero_count THEN phc1.publisher_name ELSE phc2.publisher_name END AS publisher_with_more_heroes, ABS(phc1.hero_count - phc2.hero_count) AS difference_in_heroes FROM publisher_hero_counts phc1 JOIN publisher_hero_counts phc2 ON phc1.publisher_name IN ('DC Comics', 'Marvel Comics') WHERE phc2.publisher_name IN ('DC Comics', 'Marvel Comics') AND phc1.publisher_name <> phc2.publisher_name;
chatgpt_4mini: WITH publisher_counts AS ( SELECT p.publisher_name, COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS superhero_count FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id GROUP BY p.publisher_name ) SELECT pc.publisher_name, pc.superhero_count, (SELECT superhero_count FROM publisher_counts WHERE publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics') - (SELECT superhero_count FROM publisher_counts WHERE publisher_name = 'DC Comics') AS difference FROM publisher_counts pc WHERE pc.publisher_name IN ('DC Comics', 'Marvel Comics');

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH bad_heroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bad_heroes FROM superhero s JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id WHERE a.alignment = 'Bad' ) SELECT ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / bh.total_bad_heroes, 2) AS percentage_of_bad_females FROM superhero s JOIN gender g ON s.gender_id = g.id JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id CROSS JOIN bad_heroes bh WHERE a.alignment = 'Bad' AND g.gender = 'Female';

gemini_1.5_Flash: SELECT COUNT(b.id) - COUNT(n.id) AS difference_blue_no_eye_color FROM ( SELECT s.id FROM superhero s LEFT JOIN colour c ON s.eye_colour_id = c.id WHERE c.colour = 'Blue' AND s.weight_kg IS NULL ) AS b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.id FROM superhero s LEFT JOIN colour c ON s.eye_colour_id = c.id WHERE c.colour IS NULL AND s.weight_kg IS NULL ) AS n ON b.id = n.id;

gemini_1.5_Flash: SELECT COUNT(*) AS fastest_heroes FROM superhero sh JOIN hero_attribute ha ON sh.id = ha.hero_id WHERE ha.attribute_name = 'Speed' AND ha.attribute_value = ( SELECT MAX(attribute_value) FROM hero_attribute WHERE attribute_name = 'Speed' );
chatgpt_4mini: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ha.hero_id) AS total_fast_superheroes FROM hero_attribute ha JOIN attribute a ON ha.attribute_id = a.id WHERE a.attribute_name = 'Speed' AND ha.attribute_value IS NOT NULL AND ha.attribute_value <> '' AND CAST(ha.attribute_value AS INTEGER) = ( SELECT MAX(CAST(attribute_value AS INTEGER)) FROM hero_attribute JOIN attribute ON hero_attribute.attribute_id = attribute.id WHERE attribute.attribute_name = 'Speed' );

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH publisher_hero_counts AS ( SELECT p.publisher_name, COUNT(*) AS total_heroes FROM superhero sh JOIN publisher p ON sh.publisher_id = p.id GROUP BY p.publisher_name ) SELECT CASE WHEN dc_count.total_heroes > marvel_count.total_heroes THEN dc_count.publisher_name || ' created more heroes' WHEN dc_count.total_heroes < marvel_count.total_heroes THEN marvel_count.publisher_name || ' created more heroes' ELSE 'Equal number of heroes created by both publishers' END AS result, ABS(dc_count.total_heroes - marvel_count.total_heroes) AS difference_in_heroes FROM publisher_hero_counts AS dc_count JOIN publisher_hero_counts AS marvel_count ON dc_count.publisher_name = 'DC Comics' AND marvel_count.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics';
chatgpt_4mini: WITH publisher_counts AS ( SELECT p.publisher_name, COUNT(s.id) AS total_heroes FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name IN ('DC', 'Marvel Comics') GROUP BY p.publisher_name ) SELECT pc1.publisher_name AS publisher, pc1.total_heroes, pc2.total_heroes AS other_publisher_heroes, ABS(pc1.total_heroes - pc2.total_heroes) AS difference FROM publisher_counts pc1 JOIN publisher_counts pc2 ON pc1.publisher_name <> pc2.publisher_name WHERE pc1.publisher_name = 'DC' OR pc1.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics';

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH black_panther AS ( SELECT sh.id FROM superhero sh WHERE sh.superhero_name = 'Black Panther' ) SELECT ha.attribute_name, ha.attribute_value FROM hero_attribute ha JOIN black_panther bp ON ha.hero_id = bp.id ORDER BY ha.attribute_value ASC LIMIT 1;

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH lucas_heroes AS ( SELECT sh.id FROM superhero sh JOIN publisher p ON sh.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'George Lucas' ) SELECT ROUND( (COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.gender_id = (SELECT id FROM gender WHERE gender = 'Female') THEN sh.id END) / COUNT(*) * 100.0), 2) AS female_hero_percentage FROM superhero sh JOIN lucas_heroes lh ON sh.id = lh.id;
chatgpt_4mini: WITH total_superheroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(s.id) AS total_count FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'George Lucas' ), female_superheroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(s.id) AS female_count FROM superhero s JOIN gender g ON s.gender_id = g.id JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'George Lucas' AND g.gender = 'Female' ) SELECT ROUND(100.0 * fs.female_count / ts.total_count, 2) AS percentage_female_superheroes FROM total_superheroes ts, female_superheroes fs;

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH marvel_heroes AS ( SELECT sh.id FROM superhero sh JOIN publisher p ON sh.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' ) SELECT ROUND( (COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.alignment_id = (SELECT id FROM alignment WHERE alignment = 'Good') THEN sh.id END) / COUNT(*) * 100.0), 2) AS good_hero_percentage FROM superhero sh JOIN marvel_heroes mh ON sh.id = mh.id;
chatgpt_4mini: WITH total_superheroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_count FROM superhero s JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' ), good_superheroes AS ( SELECT COUNT(s.id) AS good_count FROM superhero s JOIN alignment a ON s.alignment_id = a.id JOIN publisher p ON s.publisher_id = p.id WHERE p.publisher_name = 'Marvel Comics' AND a.alignment = 'Good' ) SELECT ROUND(100.0 * gs.good_count / ts.total_count, 2) AS percentage_good_superheroes FROM total_superheroes ts, good_superheroes gs;

gemini_1.5_Flash: WITH avg_height AS ( SELECT ROUND(AVG(height_cm), 2) AS average_height FROM superhero ) SELECT sp.power_name FROM superhero sh JOIN hero_power hp ON sh.id = hp.hero_id JOIN superpower sp ON hp.power_id = sp.id JOIN avg_height ah ON sh.height_cm > ah.average_height * 0.8 -- Filter by height > 80% of average GROUP BY sp.power_name;
chatgpt_4mini: WITH avg_height AS ( SELECT AVG(height_cm) AS average_height FROM superhero ), tall_heroes AS ( SELECT s.id AS hero_id FROM superhero s JOIN avg_height a ON s.height_cm > 0.8 * a.average_height ) SELECT sp.power_name FROM superpower sp JOIN hero_power hp ON sp.id = hp.power_id JOIN tall_heroes th ON hp.hero_id = th.hero_id ORDER BY sp.power_name;
